title: Light over dark: Creating Lunar Revel’s triptych

replies.body:
Very pretty indeed :) but.. i quote.

"More than lanterns" nonono... their was never lanterns! i waited last year for the pretty lantern icon to re-appear in store and it wasn't their! and i had high hopes this year but it is also not here by the looks!

where art thou lantern icon where art thou.
